sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import './EventStructure.scss' import Cooking from "../../assets/images/cooking.jpg" function EventStructure({ event, date, organizer, tags, description }) { const eventDate = new Date(date.timestamp) return (

Event: {this.eventDate.toLocaleDateString()}

Date and time: {date}

Created by: {organizer}

Tags: {tags}

Description: {description}

) } export default EventStructure
